data.description: Agronomic cropping systems of the Midwest: environmental impacts, productivity, and profitability. Cropping system diversification and sustainable agriculture. An agroecological approach, the application of ecological concepts and principles for the improvement of cropping systems is emphasized.
data.title: CROPPING SYSTEMS

data.description: Plant science applied to the growth, production, management, distribution and utilization of field crops.
data.title: PRINCIPLES AND PRACTICES IN CROP PRODUCTION
